meanings.definition: A person who teaches or trains others.
meanings.sent1: The instructors at the gym help people learn new exercises.
meanings.sent2: The instructors at the school are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent3: The instructors at the dance class made everyone laugh with their funny moves.
meanings.sent4: The instructors in the kitchen guided the students like expert chefs.
meanings.sent5: The instructors in the swimming class made the learning process enjoyable and easy.

meanings.definition: A person who provides guidance or direction.
meanings.sent1: The instructors on the hiking trip showed us the right path to take.
meanings.sent2: The instructors in the workshop helped us understand the project better.
meanings.sent3: The instructors in the maze led the group in circles, confusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The instructors in the art class pointed out the beauty in every stroke.
meanings.sent5: The instructors in the training session motivated everyone to reach their goals.
